title: Azure AI Foundry vs OpenAI Evals: Which AI Tool is Better in 2025?
metaDescription: Compare Azure AI Foundry vs OpenAI Evals. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2025.
introduction: Choosing between Azure AI Foundry and OpenAI Evals? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Azure AI Foundry vs OpenAI Evals
paragraphs: Azure AI Foundry (developer tools) is Azure AI Foundry is Microsoft's comprehensive AI development platform launched in May 2025 for building, deploying, and managing AI agents and applications. It features Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration, unified SDK combining Semantic Kernel and AutoGen, and support for Agent-to-Agent (A2A) and Model Context Protocol (MCP). Its unique value is enterprise-grade AI development with seamless Azure ecosystem integration, enabling professional developers to build sophisticated agentic applications at scale.. It's known for ai-platform, ai-agents, microsoft.

OpenAI Evals (llm ops) is OpenAI Evals is an open-source framework designed for evaluating the performance of large language models (LLMs) and AI systems. It provides a standardized methodology for creating, running, and benchmarking evaluations, enabling researchers and developers to systematically measure model capabilities, identify weaknesses, and track progress. Its key differentiator is its community-driven approach, allowing for the contribution and sharing of custom evaluation suites, which fosters reproducibility and collective advancement in AI assessment.. Users choose it for openai, llm-evaluation, benchmarking-framework.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Azure AI Foundry: AI Agent Service for multi-agent orchestration, Unified SDK (Semantic Kernel + AutoGen), Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol support

OpenAI Evals: Standardized evaluation templates for consistent test creation, Support for custom datasets and task-specific evaluation logic, Integration with OpenAI API and other LLMs for automated grading

verdict: Both Azure AI Foundry and OpenAI Evals are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Azure AI Foundry for ai-platform, OpenAI Evals for openai.
